Name: Maestro Smash
Ingredients: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: MUDDLE lime and basil in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Polish Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Karim Bibars at Pergamin Bar in Krakow.
